Title: "Construct a check dam for every 5 km"
Content: The Government of Tamil Nadu should construct a check dam for every 5 km across all rivers if the present cultivable area of 47 lakh hectares is to be increased to 1 crore hectares, former Union Mini
Author: Special Correspondent
Description: The Government of Tamil Nadu should construct a check dam for every 5 km across all rivers if the present cultivable area of 47 lakh hectares is to be increased to 1 crore hectares, former Union Mini
